text:
*Megawatt is hiring a B2B Tech Content Strategist [Agency Role]* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

The ideal content marketing strategist for Megawatt will have experience in three areas: 

Managing client accounts and keeping clients happy
Developing and executing content strategies
Writing & editing stellar marketing and sales content 

B2B tech experience a must.

*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:hiring@megawattcontent.com|hiring@megawattcontent.com>`
